New Records: Kamindu Mendis equals legendary Don Bradman with new record
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli's 95 helped India chase down a 274-run target with four wickets in hand and 12 balls to spare
Mohammed Shami's five-wicket haul restricted New Zealand to below 280
Rohit Sharma became the first Indian to hit 50-plus ODI sixes in a calendar year
Virat Kohli stitched three solid partnerships to take India home
India's first win against New Zealand in the World Cup since the 2003 edition
Post-Match Reflections: India's win propelled them to the top of the standings with 10 points
This was India's first win against New Zealand in the World Cup since 2003
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 20 overs per side was not mentioned but it was mentioned that the play was also halted due to fog
Others: India secured their fifth consecutive win in the 2023 ICC ODI World Cup by defeating New Zealand in Dharamsala
